name: Object LD48
description:
Made for LudumDare 48

Object LD48. Deep space object. Big. Probably an old comet.

Initial scanning showed it's mostly hollow. Impossible.

Previous missions never returned. No answers. Only questions.

What happened? What is this? Why the orbit changed before reaching Mars?

Commander, we believe there is something going on.

You are the hope to our answers.

Good luck.

Controls:

A/D - Move

Space - Jump

Left Ctrl/Left click - Shoot

Sorry for the half finished game :| Much was scrapped or left unfinished.
